<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/clients/{clientId}/sp/sites/{siteId}/lists/{listId}/fields/{fieldId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This function retrieves a specific field from a SharePoint list using the provided list ID and
field ID.
